items.title: 7zip
items.content_html: Version 24.09 published on 2024-11-29. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes compatibility for updated systems and enhanced performance improvements for the 7-Zip platform.

items.title: awscli2
items.content_html: Version 2.24.6 published on 2023-10. The summary of changes are: Enhancements include DMS replicationConfigArn support, DbCluster management in timestream-influxdb, and ComputeRoleArn integration in Amplify Hosting.

items.title: azurecli
items.content_html: Version 2.69.0 published on 2023-02-11. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release includes updated features and bug fixes for enhanced performance and stability.

items.title: bicepcli
items.content_html: Version v0.33.93 published on 2025-01-29. The summary of changes are: Fixes language server crash, deployment failures for looped resources, and promotes Deployment Pane to a stable feature.

items.title: bruno
items.content_html: Version 1.39.0 published on 2025-02-14. The summary of changes are: This release introduces NTLM authentication, improved expression handling across runtimes, and drag-and-drop support for moving collections. Numerous bug fixes and UX improvements are also included.

items.title: clink
items.content_html: Version v1.7.10 published on 2023-02-07. The summary of changes are: Added new Lua API unicode.char() for Unicode codepoints. Introduced a clink-diagnostics-output command for troubleshooting. Fixed a crash issue when console window width is less than the screen buffer width.

items.title: dbeaver
items.content_html: Version 24.3.5 published on February 16th, 2025. The summary of changes are: This release includes stability improvements and new features tailored to enhance user experience. It is free and open source, ensuring compatibility across multiple platforms.

items.title: dive
items.content_html: Version v0.12.0 published on 2024-02-02. The summary of changes are: The latest release adds docker layer-wise scan for vulnerability detection, provides GitLab CI usage instructions, resolves compatibility issues with Docker 25+, and includes bug fixes along with updated Go version.

items.title: docker-desktop
items.content_html: Version 4.38.0 published on 2025-01-30. The summary of changes are: Major updates include the general availability of the PKG installer, enforcing sign-in via configuration profiles, and the ability to update tools like Docker Compose and Docker CLI independently of Docker Desktop. Bug fixes address container creation issues, RAM policy refresh, and several Mac-specific glitches.

items.title: dotnet6
items.content_html: Version 6.0.36 published on November 12, 2024. The summary of changes are: This is the final release of .NET 6.0, which has reached end of life. It is no longer supported, and users are recommended to upgrade to a supported version, such as .NET 9.0.

items.title: dotnet8
items.content_html: Version 8.0.13 published on February 11, 2025. The summary of changes are: This release introduces enhancements and bug fixes across the .NET platform for better performance. It includes updates to runtimes, SDKs, and language support. Developers are encouraged to upgrade for optimal stability and new features.

items.title: drawio
items.content_html: Version 26.0.9 published on 2025-01-27. The summary of changes are: This release updates the draw.io core to version 26.0.9 and includes all changes made from 26.0.8 to 26.0.9, alongside upgrading to Electron 32.2.5.

items.title: etlp2pcapng
items.content_html: Version v1.11.0 published on 2023-06-08. The summary of changes are: Improved handling of pktmon captures for better usability and stability.

items.title: ffmpeg
items.content_html: Version 7.1 published on 2024-09-30. The summary of changes are: FFmpeg 7.1 'PÃ©ter' is the latest stable release featuring updates to key libraries such as libavutil and libavcodec, ensuring better performance and compatibility. It was cut from the master branch on 2024-09-24. This release includes numerous enhancements and bug fixes.

items.title: gateway
items.content_html: Version unstable-alpha published on 07 Mar. The summary of changes are: This is an unstable alpha release with a deprecated API. Core library components are tested but the API is undergoing a breaking transition. It serves as a snapshot for migration to the new API.

items.title: git-win
items.content_html: Version v2.48.1.windows.1 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: The release includes Git v2.48.1, updated tools, and marks the last version to ship with a 32-bit installer.

items.title: gitlab-cli
items.content_html: Version v1.22.0 published on 2022-01-10. The summary of changes are: The latest release added new functionality such as CI job retry command, squash-before-merge support, and --reviewer parameter for merge requests. It also included multiple fixes for CI pipeline view and updates for documentation. Deprecated features and obsolete conditions were removed for better user experience.

items.title: gitlab-releaser-cli
items.content_html: Version 17.9.0 published on 2025-02-17. The summary of changes are: This release includes improvements in performance and minor bug fixes to enhance the stability of the CLI tool.

items.title: gitlab-runner-agent
items.content_html: Version 17.9.0 published on 2025-02-17. The summary of changes are: This release includes performance improvements, new features, and bug fixes.

items.title: golang
items.content_html: Version go1.24.0 published on N/A. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest features, improvements, and security updates for Go, providing enhanced stability and performance. Further details can be found in the release notes.

items.title: golang1.22
items.content_html: Version 1.22.12 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package, as well as bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: golang1.23
items.content_html: Version go1.23.6 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package and bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: helm
items.content_html: Version v3.17.1 published on 2025-02-12. The summary of changes are: Helm v3.17.1 is a patch release with bug fixes and improvements. Users are encouraged to upgrade for the best experience. Join the Kubernetes Slack for discussions and support.

items.title: inkscape
items.content_html: Version 1.4 published on 2024-10-13. The summary of changes are: Inkscape 1.4 introduces new features such as a Filter Gallery, modular grids, improved swatches dialog, and enhanced font browser, alongside numerous bug fixes for a smoother design experience.

items.title: intellij-idea-ultimate
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.3 published on 2025-02-12. The summary of changes are: IntelliJ IDEA 2024.3.3 addresses valuable fixes, including correct syncing of Maven dependencies, improved screen reader detection on Windows startup, and restored IDE functionalities for resolving merge conflicts.

items.title: jmeter
items.content_html: Version 5.6.3 published on 2024-01-07. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release includes performance improvements and bug fixes, ensuring smoother and more reliable operation.

items.title: jq
items.content_html: Version 1.7.1 published on 2023-12-13. The summary of changes are: This release includes fixes for two security vulnerabilities, CLI improvements such as better background color defaults and inline script passing, and language updates including memory leak fixes and enhanced standards compliance.

items.title: kubectl
items.content_html: Version 1.32.2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes critical updates and bug fixes for improved stability and security.

items.title: make-win
items.content_html: Version 3.81 published on 2006-11-25. The summary of changes are: GNU make utility for managing project builds. Automates file dependency updates and streamlines build processes.

items.title: maven
items.content_html: Version 3.9.9 published on 2025-02-16. The summary of changes are: Apache Maven 3.9.9 introduces bug fixes and minor improvements, recommended for all users. It ensures compatibility with JDK 8 and above, allowing builds for older JDK versions using toolchains.

items.title: miniconda
items.content_html: Version 25.1.1-2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes bug fixes and updates the conda-anaconda-tos package to version 0.1.2 for improved stability and performance.

items.title: node
items.content_html: Version v20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10. The summary of changes are: This release focuses on stability and includes updates for improved performance and minor bug fixes.

items.title: node16
items.content_html: Version 16.20.2 published on 2023-08-08. The summary of changes are: This release mainly includes security fixes and minor updates to improve stability and performance.

items.title: node18
items.content_html: Version 18.20.6 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: This latest release improves stability and includes minor bug fixes for the Hydrogen branch.

items.title: node20
items.content_html: Version 20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10. The summary of changes are: This release includes the most recent updates and fixes, ensuring stability and enhanced performance for Node.js users.

items.title: node22
items.content_html: Version v22.14.0 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: The release includes the latest updates and bug fixes. Compatible npm version updated to v10.9.2.

items.title: notepad-plus-plus
items.content_html: Version 8.7.7 published on 2025-02-07. The summary of changes are: This release addresses a regression in v8.7.6 related to SCN_MODIFIED notification events for specific plugins and introduces the new API NPPM_ADDSCNMODIFIEDFLAGS.

items.title: openshift
items.content_html: Version 4.17.0-okd-scos.0 published on 2024-12-16. The summary of changes are: This release includes client tooling for OKD and enhancements from the okd-scos repository. Refer to the upgrade notes for existing OKD 4.15 clusters. Artifacts and tools have been verified for security and integrity.

items.title: oraclejdk11
items.content_html: Version 11.0.26 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: This release introduces IANA time zone data 2024b, security enhancements, and new debugging options for java.security. It also includes numerous bug fixes and performance improvements.

items.title: oraclejdk17
items.content_html: Version 17.0.14 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: This release includes IANA time zone data 2024b updates, fixes several security vulnerabilities, and introduces enhancements such as improved string concatenation behavior and expanded ProcessBuilder argument handling for Windows.

items.title: oraclejdk21
items.content_html: Version 21.0.6 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes IANA time zone data 2024b updates, improves historical timezone data for Mexico, Mongolia, and Portugal, and fixes several critical security vulnerabilities.

items.title: oraclejdk8
items.content_html: Version 8u441 published on not provided. The summary of changes are: JDK 8u441 is the latest General Availability (GA) release, offering critical fixes and updates to enhance performance and security.

items.title: powershell
items.content_html: Version 7.5.0 published on 2025-01-23. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates to .NET SDK 9.0.102, improved build and packaging, and enhancements to NuGet stage handling for better stability.

items.title: putty
items.content_html: Version 0.83 published on 2025-02-08. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates and fixes to improve stability and performance. It is recommended for all users. Note that newer features may be available in development snapshots.

items.title: python
items.content_html: Version 3.13.2 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Python 3.13.2 includes bug fixes and improvements from the previous release, ensuring enhanced stability and performance.

items.title: python3.10
items.content_html: Version 3.10.16 published on Dec. 3, 2024. The summary of changes are: Latest stable release for Python 3.10 with security updates and minor bug fixes.

items.title: python3.11
items.content_html: Version 3.11.11 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release includes minor bug fixes and security improvements to enhance Python's performance and safety.

items.title: python3.12
items.content_html: Version 3.12.9 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements in the Python 3.12 series. Further iterations enhance stability and usability for developers. It is the most up-to-date stable version for this branch.

items.title: python3.9
items.content_html: Version 3.9.21 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release includes security fixes and minor improvements to enhance stability and compatibility.

items.title: rider
items.content_html: Version 2023.2.2 published on 2023-09-14. The summary of changes are: Minor updates improving stability and fixing bugs.

items.title: screentogif
items.content_html: Version 2.40 published on 2023-12-06. The summary of changes are: This release includes compatibility with .NET 8 and optimizations for Windows 10 version 1607 or later.

items.title: task
items.content_html: Version v3.41.0 published on 2025-01-18. The summary of changes are: Fixed issues with dynamic variables, added a TASK_DIR special variable, improved error handling, and updated installation methods.

items.title: terraform
items.content_html: Version v1.10.5 published on 2025-01-22. The summary of changes are: Fixed crashes for negative index in element(...), updated dependency to address CVE-2025-0377, and improved error messages for jsondecode with duplicate keys.

items.title: vscode
items.content_html: Version 1.97 published on January 2025. The summary of changes are: Key highlights include Next Edit Suggestions, repositionable Command Palette, and security-focused extension publisher trust. Additional updates enhance debugging, search, and accessibility features.

items.title: windows-terminal
items.content_html: Version 1.22.10352.0 published on 2023-02-06. The summary of changes are: Windows Terminal 1.22 has been marked stable. It introduces a rewritten console hosting implementation supporting Sixels and Grapheme Clusters for enhanced compatibility and performance, along with a new UI for pop-ups in CMD and Python.

items.title: winmerge
items.content_html: Version 2.16.46 published on 2025-01-27. The summary of changes are: The release includes critical bug fixes, improved folder comparison features with prompt for copying only differences, and updated translations for multiple languages.

items.title: wireshark
items.content_html: Version 4.4.3 published on Not specified. The summary of changes are: The current stable release includes all previous updates and supersedes older versions.

items.title: yq
items.content_html: Version v4.45.1 published on 2025-01-12. The summary of changes are: Added support to create parent directories when --split-exp is used and bumped dependencies.
